content:

  • personnel - -425890 (+910) persons liquidated

  • combat armored vehicles -12901 (+27)

  • RSZV -1016 (0)
  • air defense means -713 (+2)
  • aircraft -347 (0)
  • Helicopters -325 (0)
  • UAV of the operative-tactical level-8184 (+43)
  • Winged rockets -1920 (+1)
  • ships / boats -26 (0)
  • submarines -1 (0)
  • Automobile equipment and tanks -13870 (+44)
  • Special technique -1691 (+5)

Data are clarified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source:The General Staff of the Armed Forces of UkraineAs of 12.03.24.
title: More than 900 Russian invaders, 27 BBMs and 23 artistem
